modulegroup.name: Calendar
modulegroup.description: The Calendar package enables you to manage dates. You can publish dates on your website. Dates can be tagged.

module.name: Next dates box with tag filter

modules.module: Shows the upcoming dates. Dates can optionally be filtered by tags.

module.name: Month calendar box with tag filter

modules.module: A monthly calendar highlighting the dates of the current month. Dates can optionally be filtered by tags.
Shows the content of a selected date - or an overview of upcoming events. Dates can be filtered by tags.
A frontend editing component for surfers. Surfers can create and edit their own dates.
Create and manage dates for the calender modules.
Simple HTML content module for calendar dates.
Simple HTML content module for calendar dates with a link.
